document_data.name: Corrupt
document_data.mainbody: '''''Corrupt''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[alteration]] and [[necromancy]] [[spell]] used by priests devoted to [[Myrkul]], enabling them to create weaknesses in substances.
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed the caster to create weak spots in [[armor]] or solid surfaces, contaminate water, and generally modify substances with a harmful effect. ''Corrupt'' would weaken ''[[healing potion]]s'', negate [[holy water]], strengthen [[unholy water]], and temporarily disable other [[magic item]]s for several minutes. The caster could affect one selected target with each casting of this spell. This spell could be cast by several priests to greatly enhance the corruption it wrought. Furthermore, a single priest could cast the spell on the same location multiple times to achieve greater results over time.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
